import React, {useState} from "react"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; export default function CreateRecipe(){ const[input,setInput] = useState({ name:"", tipodeplato: "", healthscore: "", imagen:"", summary: "", pasoapaso: "", }) const[diets,setDiets] = useState({ GlutenFree: false }) const submitHandler=(e)=>{ e.preventDefault() } const handleChange=(e)=>{ console.log(e) console.log([e.target.name]) console.log([e.target.value]) setInput({ ...input, [e.target.name]:e.target.value }) } const handleChangeB=(e)=>{ console.log(e) if(e.target.checked){ setDiets({ ...input, [e.target.name]:true }) }else{ setDiets({ ...input, [e.target.name]:false }) }} //setInput({ //...input, // [e.target.name]:e.target.value. // //}) return(

Create new recipe

Diets:
If you don´t know which diet your recipe corresponds to, please check here
